channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Toluwalase Okuwoga
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Toluwalase Okuwoga

item.title: Project 1: Commodity Trade
item.description: Cleaned the data to fill missing values and deal with outliers. Used different visualization techniques to derive meaningful insight from the Data. Created a Dashboard using Dash by Plotly to visualize the top 10 Countries in trade by USD. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 2: Hotel bookings prediction
item.description: Did an Exploratory Data Analysis to better understand the data and answer some important questions. Created a model that predicts whether or not a guest that has booked will actually come. Evaluated the features that are the most important to predict cancellations. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Contact
item.description: Follow me on these social media platforms. Platform URL LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/toluwalase-okuwoga-405a6910b/ Medium: https://medium.com/@okuwogatoluwalase GitHub: https://github.com/ToluwalaseOkuwoga
